recommended_degree: Administrasi, Manajemen, Manajemen Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi Logistik (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist Lead Document Handling team in managing Document Handling System.
- Assist in Managing, control, filling, and distribute project documentation
- Assist in Monitoring, update and maintain, distribute, and fill project documents and vendor documents.
- Assist in Providing document status report.
